name: Standard Room
description: Enjoy a peaceful stay in our cozy single room with a view of the city skyline. This room is perfect for solo travelers looking for a comfortable and relaxing experience. The room features a twin-size bed, a private bathroom, and all the essential amenities you need for a pleasant stay. Whether you're here for business or leisure, you'll find everything you need in this well-appointed room.

name: Superior Room
description: Step into spacious luxury in our double room with a balcony overlooking the garden. Ideal for couples or those who appreciate extra space, this room features a comfortable queen-size bed and a private balcony where you can enjoy the tranquil garden view. With a size of 400 sq. ft., this room offers ample room to relax and unwind. Make your stay a memorable one with this elegant accommodation.

name: Signature Room
description: Indulge in the lap of luxury with our spacious suite featuring a private jacuzzi and an oceanfront view. This king-size bed suite offers 600 sq. ft. of opulent living space, complete with a private jacuzzi for a truly relaxing experience. Bask in the breathtaking ocean views from the comfort of your room. Whether it's a special occasion or you simply deserve the best, this suite delivers an unforgettable experience.

name: Single Room
description: Experience the charm of our twin room with vintage decor and a garden view. This room is designed for those who appreciate unique aesthetics. The room features twin beds and a garden view that adds to the tranquil ambiance. With 300 sq. ft. of space, it provides a cozy retreat with a touch of nostalgia. Enjoy a delightful stay in this one-of-a-kind room.

name: Executive Suite
description: Elevate your stay in our executive suite with a private office space and a city view. This king-size bed suite offers a spacious 700 sq. ft. of luxurious living space, complete with a private office area for your convenience. Enjoy a panoramic city view from your room, making it perfect for business travelers or those who want to stay productive during their visit. Experience a blend of comfort and functionality.

name: Deluxe Room
description: Find solace in our quaint single room featuring a cozy fireplace and a mountain view. This room is perfect for solo travelers seeking a tranquil retreat. The room features twin beds, a charming fireplace, and picturesque mountain views. With 270 sq. ft. of space, it's an ideal place to unwind and enjoy the serene mountain atmosphere.

name: Luxury Suite Room
description: Experience elegance in our luxurious suite with a private terrace and panoramic ocean view. This spacious suite with a king-size bed offers 650 sq. ft. of living space, complete with a private terrace where you can take in the breathtaking ocean vistas. Whether it's a romantic getaway or a special occasion, this suite is designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life.
